A

Actor - Interface in battle
A participant in a battle that can have turns and perform actions when those turns are due.
addEffect(Status) - Method in class battle.SkillBuilder
Adds a new Status object to apply to targets of this skill during successful execution.
addListener(FighterHandler) - Method in class battle.Fighter
 
addListener(SkillHandler) - Method in class battle.Skill
 
addListener(SkillHandler) - Method in class battle.SkillBuilder
Adds a new SkillHandler object to receive method calls during appropriate events in the skill, such as successful skill execution.
addListener(StatusHandler) - Method in class battle.Status
 
addListener(StatusHandler) - Method in class battle.StatusBuilder
Adds a new StatusHandler object to receive method calls during appropriate events in the skill, such status application and removal.
addRequirement(String) - Method in class battle.SkillBuilder
Adds the name of a new Status object required to be owned by the targets of this skill in order for a successful execution.
addSkill(Skill) - Method in class battle.Fighter
 
addSubSkill(Skill) - Method in class battle.SkillBuilder
Adds a new Skill object required to execute successfully before this skill can apply its effects.
addTurnItem(TurnItem) - Method in class battle.TurnOrder
Adds an item to the turn order.
advanceAll() - Method in class battle.TurnOrder
Advances the turn order until it has determined that successful events can no longer occur.
advanceTime(Duration) - Method in class battle.Skill
 
advanceTime(Duration) - Method in class battle.Status
 
advanceTime(Duration) - Method in interface battle.TurnItem
Advances the time dependent values of the turn item.
advanceToNext() - Method in class battle.TurnOrder
Advances to the next point in time where at least one successful event occurs.
ANY_ALLY - Static variable in class battle.Target
Allied fighters on the battlefield, including the fighter with the targeting skill.
ANY_ENEMY - Static variable in class battle.Target
Enemy fighters on the battlefield.
ANY_OTHER_ALLY - Static variable in class battle.Target
Allied fighters on the battlefield, excluding the fighter with the targeting skill.
ANYONE - Static variable in class battle.Target
Any fighter on the battlefield.
ANYONE_ELSE - Static variable in class battle.Target
Any fighter on the battlefield, except for the fighter with the targeting skill.
applyCondition - Variable in class battle.Status
 
applyCondition - Variable in class battle.StatusBuilder
Stores the applyCondition value for producing a Status object.
applyStatus(Status) - Method in class battle.Fighter
Attempts to apply the given Status object to the fighter.
